events.name: BatchAccepted
events.description: A new batch is accepted into the inventory for tracking.

events.name: BatchShipped
events.description: Indicates that a batch has been shipped to the customer.

events.name: BatchDelivered
events.description: Indicates that a batch has been successfully delivered.

events.name: ColdChainBreachDetected
events.description: A breach in cold chain conditions triggers an alert.

commands.name: AcceptBatch

commands.name: DeliverBatch
commands.description: Indicates that a batch has been successfully delivered.

commands.name: ReportBreach
commands.description: A breach in cold chain conditions triggers an alert.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
